title: Data Tools for Shiny Apps

title: Data Tools for Shiny Apps
text: see NEWS.md

title: Data Tools for Shiny Apps
text: Access uploads file, url, Pandora Platform. Optionally, merge data import via UI SQL. UI function: Server function: Example apply UI server function shiny module: https://github.com/Pandora-IsoMemo/data-tools/blob/91a16dd78bdada382e378d78eb218bb8b815f1bc/R/01-toolsPanel.R#L13 https://github.com/Pandora-IsoMemo/data-tools/blob/91a16dd78bdada382e378d78eb218bb8b815f1bc/R/01-toolsPanel.R#L31-L37 Functions check validity imports:
code: DataTools::importDataUI(id, label = "Import Data") DataTools::importDataServer(id, rowNames = NULL, colNames = NULL, customWarningChecks = list(), customErrorChecks = list(), ignoreWarnings = FALSE, defaultSource = "ckan") DataTools::checkWarningEmptyValues(data) DataTools::checkAnyNonNumericColumns(data) DataTools::checkErrorNoNumericColumns(data)

title: Data Tools for Shiny Apps
text: function catch forward errors warnings app’s UI

title: Data Tools for Shiny Apps
text: Numbers Prefix. Grouped files type functionality. Lower number indicate functions closer functionality app / higher abstraction level 00: Start application / main functionality / Namespace 01: Main shiny modules (basically tabs app) 02: Helper shiny modules (files include ui + server component) 03: Helper functions

title: Configure Data UI — configureDataUI
text: UI module Server function module

title: Configure Data UI — configureDataUI
code: configureDataUI(   id,   batch,   outputAsMatrix,   isLink = FALSE,   customHelpText = importOptions()[["customHelpText"]],   defaultFileTypes = config()[["dataFileTypes"]],   userFileTypes = c() )  configureDataServer(   id,   mergeList,   customNames,   dataSource,   ignoreWarnings = FALSE )

title: Configure Data UI — configureDataUI
text: id id module batch (logical) use batch import. outputAsMatrix (logical) TRUE output must matrix, e.g. batch = TRUE Resources. isLink (logical) TRUE, data source link customHelpText (list) help text element can added UI definition. Output shiny::helpText(...). defaultFileTypes (character) default file types userFileTypes (character) user file types specified "Pandora Platform" settings mergeList (reactiveVal) list data imports submitted data processing via buttons 'Create Query data' 'Prepare / Merge data' customNames settings custom column row names dataSource (reactiveValues) path, filename, type input, output selectSourceServer() ignoreWarnings (logical) TRUE enable imports case warnings

title: Configure File UI — configureFileUI
text: UI module Server function module

title: Configure File UI — configureFileUI
code: configureFileUI(   id,   customHelpText = importOptions()[["customHelpText"]],   defaultFileTypes = config()[["dataFileTypes"]],   userFileTypes = c() )  configureFileServer(   id,   importType = "model",   dataSource,   subFolder = NULL,   rPackageName = importOptions()[["rPackageName"]],   onlySettings = FALSE,   fileExtension = "zip",   expectedFileInZip = c() )

title: Configure File UI — configureFileUI
text: id id module customHelpText (list) help text element can added UI definition. Output shiny::helpText(...). defaultFileTypes (character) default file types userFileTypes (character) user file types specified "Pandora Platform" settings importType (character) type import, either "model", "zip" "list". ImportType == "model" expects zip file containing model. file unzipped, model object extracted, checked valid app. ImportType == "zip" enables optional parameter 'expectedFileInZip'. file validated path zip file returned. ImportType == "list" expects json file containing list. file read checked. dataSource (reactiveValues) path, filename, type input, output selectSourceServer() subFolder (character) (optional) subfolder containing loadable .zip files. rPackageName (character) name package (Description file) module called. value needed determine Github repository package loading example models zip data links. onlySettings (logical) TRUE allow upload user inputs user data. fileExtension (character) (otional) app specific file extension, e.g. "resources", "bmsc", "bpred", (app-unspecific) "zip". files extension valid import. expectedFileInZip (character) (optional) parameter ignored importType != "zip". File names must contained zip upload.

title: downUploadButton module server — downUploadButtonServer
text: downUploadButton module server

title: downUploadButton module server — downUploadButtonServer
code: downUploadButtonServer(   id,   dat,   inputs,   model,   rPackageName,   githubRepo,   mainFolder = "predefinedModels",   subFolder = NULL,   fileExtension = "zip",   helpHTML = "",   modelNotes = reactive(""),   onlySettings = FALSE,   compress = TRUE,   compressionLevel = 9,   reset = reactive(FALSE),   title = "Download and Upload of Models",   labelRemote = "Load online model",   labelLocal = "Load local model" )

title: downUploadButton module server — downUploadButtonServer
text: id module id dat (reactive) user data inputs (reactiveValues) reactiveValues list user inputs, cases just "inputs" list model (reactive) model output object rPackageName (character) name package (Description file) module called. value needed determine Github repository package loading example models zip data links. githubRepo (character) name used github repository, e.g. "bpred" mainFolder (character) folder containing loadable .zip files. apps folder "predefinedModels". apps can found "inst/app/". subFolder (character) (optional) subfolder containing loadable .zip files fileExtension (character) (optional) app specific file extension, e.g. "resources", "bpred", "bmsc" helpHTML content help function modelNotes (reactive) notes regarding object saved displayed uploaded onlySettings (logical) TRUE allow download user inputs user data compress logical specifying whether saving named file use "gzip" compression, one "gzip", "bzip2" "xz" indicate type compression used. Ignored file connection. compressionLevel number 1 9. 9 compresses best, also takes longest. reset (reactive) resets selection online files title title used inside modal labelRemote label input remote files labelLocal label input local files

what: UI function of download model module — downloadModelUI
title: UI function of download model module — downloadModelUI
text: Download model module download zip file notes (list ) model(s)

title: UI function of download model module — downloadModelUI
code: downloadModelUI(   id,   title = NULL,   titleTag = "h4",   label = "Download",   width = NULL )  downloadModelServer(   id,   dat,   inputs,   model,   pathToOtherZip = reactive(NULL),   rPackageName,   subFolder = NULL,   customFileName = reactive(""),   defaultFileName = "",   fileExtension = "zip",   helpHTML = "",   modelNotes = reactive(""),   triggerUpdate = reactive(TRUE),   onlySettings = FALSE,   compress = TRUE,   compressionLevel = 9 )

title: UI function of download model module — downloadModelUI
text: id namespace id title (character) module title titleTag (character) HTML tag put around title, e.g. "h4" h4 htmltools label button label width width inputs percent dat (reactive) user data inputs (reactiveValues) reactiveValues list user inputs, cases just "inputs" list model (reactive) model output object pathToOtherZip (reactive) path another zip file. content added zip file contains content download. Needed MapR. NULL, files added. rPackageName (character) name package (Description file) module called. value needed determine Github repository package loading example models zip data links. subFolder (character) (optional) subfolder containing loadable .zip files customFileName (reactive) custom file name, empty ("") default file name used. example, reactive name updated model uploaded app. defaultFileName (character) default file name, empty ("") default file name created containing current time fileExtension (character) (optional) app specific file extension, e.g. "resources", "bpred", "bmsc" helpHTML content help function modelNotes (reactive) notes regarding object saved displayed uploaded triggerUpdate (reactive) trigger update "Notes" text input. Useful, applying module inside modal window. onlySettings (logical) TRUE allow download user inputs user data compress logical specifying whether saving named file use "gzip" compression, one "gzip", "bzip2" "xz" indicate type compression used. Ignored file connection. compressionLevel number 1 9. 9 compresses best, also takes longest.

title: Data import module — importDataUI
text: Displays button opens import dialog clicked. Wrapper around importUI default label "Import Data". Backend data import module

title: Data import module — importDataUI
code: importDataUI(id, label = "Import Data")  importDataServer(   id,   title = "",   defaultSource = c("ckan", "file", "url", "remoteModel"),   ckanFileTypes = c("xls", "xlsx", "csv", "odt", "txt"),   ignoreWarnings = FALSE,   importType = c("data", "model", "zip", "list"),   rowNames = reactiveVal(NULL),   colNames = reactiveVal(NULL),   customWarningChecks = list(),   customErrorChecks = list(),   batch = FALSE,   outputAsMatrix = FALSE,   fileExtension = "zip",   mainFolder = NULL,   subFolder = NULL,   rPackageName = "",   onlySettings = FALSE,   expectedFileInZip = c(),   options = importOptions() )

title: Data import module — importDataUI
text: id id module label label button title title import module defaultSource (character) default source input "Source", e.g. "ckan", "file", "url" ckanFileTypes (character) file types allowed import Pandora ("ckan"). E.g. `importType = "data"`: c("xls", "xlsx", "csv", "odt", "txt"); `importType = "zip"`: c("zip");  `importType = "list"`: c("json") ignoreWarnings (logical) TRUE enable imports case warnings importType (character) DEPRECATED. type import, either "data", "model", "zip" "list". ImportType == "model" expects zip file containing model. file unzipped, model object extracted, checked valid app. ImportType == "zip" enables optional parameter 'expectedFileInZip'. file validated path zip file returned. ImportType == "list" expects json file containing list. file read checked. rowNames (reactive) use rownames imported data. colNames (reactive) use colnames imported data. customWarningChecks list reactive(!) functions executed importing data.  functions need return TRUE check successful character warning otherwise. customErrorChecks list reactive(!) functions executed importing data.   functions need return TRUE check successful character warning otherwise. batch (logical) use batch import. outputAsMatrix (logical) TRUE output must matrix, e.g. batch = TRUE Resources. fileExtension (character) (otional) app specific file extension, e.g. "resources", "bmsc", "bpred", (app-unspecific) "zip". files extension valid import. mainFolder (character) DEPRECATED. folder containing loadable .zip files. subFolder (character) (optional) subfolder containing loadable .zip files. parameter ignored importType == "data" rPackageName (character) DEPRECATED. Instead, please use options = importOptions(rPackageName = <package>). onlySettings (logical) TRUE allow upload user inputs user data. parameter ignored importType == "data" expectedFileInZip (character) (optional) parameter ignored importType != "zip". File names must contained zip upload. options (list) Extra options import module. See importOptions.

title: Import Options — importOptions
text: Extra options import module.

title: Import Options — importOptions
text: rPackageName (character) name package (Description file) module called. value needed determine Github repository package loading example models zip data links. githubRepo (character) name used github repository, e.g. "bpred" customHelpText (list) help text element can added UI definition. Output shiny::helpText(...).

title: Import module — importUI
text: Displays button opens import dialog clicked Backend import module

title: Import module — importUI
code: importUI(id, label = "Import Model", title = NULL, titleTag = "h4")  importServer(   id,   title = "",   defaultSource = c("ckan", "file", "url", "remoteModel"),   ckanFileTypes = c("zip"),   ignoreWarnings = FALSE,   importType = c("model", "zip", "list"),   fileExtension = "zip",   subFolder = NULL,   onlySettings = FALSE,   expectedFileInZip = c(),   options = importOptions() )

title: Import module — importUI
text: id id module label label button title (character) module title titleTag (character) HTML tag put around title, e.g. "h4" h4 htmltools defaultSource (character) default source input "Source", e.g. "ckan", "file", "url" ckanFileTypes (character) file types allowed import Pandora ("ckan"). E.g. `importType = "model"`: c("resources", "zip"); `importType = "zip"`: c("zip"); `importType = "list"`: c("json") ignoreWarnings (logical) TRUE enable imports case warnings importType (character) type import, either "model", "zip" "list". ImportType == "model" expects zip file containing model. file unzipped, model object extracted, checked valid app. ImportType == "zip" enables optional parameter 'expectedFileInZip'. file validated path zip file returned. ImportType == "list" expects json file containing list. file read checked. fileExtension (character) (otional) app specific file extension, e.g. "resources", "bmsc", "bpred", (app-unspecific) "zip". files extension valid import. subFolder (character) (optional) subfolder containing loadable .zip files. onlySettings (logical) TRUE allow upload user inputs user data. expectedFileInZip (character) (optional) parameter ignored importType != "zip". File names must contained zip upload. options (list) Extra options import module. See importOptions.

title: Remote models module — remoteModelsUI
text: id id module selectLabel label select input buttonLabel button label width width inputs percent githubRepo (character) name used github repository, e.g. "bpred" pathToLocal (character) relative path folder storing local files folderOnGithub (character) folder github remote files stored. correspond 'pathToLocal' since online offline files --date fileExtension (character) DEPRECATED, use anymore. (otional) app specific file  extension, e.g. "resources", "bmsc", "bpred", (app-unspecific) "zip". files extension valid import. onlyLocalModels (reactive) TRUE local files used instead accessing github resetSelected (reactive) TRUE resets selected remote file reloadChoices (reactive) trigger access  github reload choices remote files rPackageName (character) DEPRECATED (use removed future): name package (description file) module applied, e.g. "Bpred" rPackageVersion (character) DEPRECATED (use removed future): current version package module applied, e.g. utils::packageVersion("Bpred") isInternet (reactive) TRUE internet connection

title: Select File Type UI — selectFileTypeUI
code: selectFileTypeUI(   id,   defaultFileTypes = config()[["dataFileTypes"]],   userFileTypes = c() )  selectFileTypeServer(id, dataSource)

title: Select File Type UI — selectFileTypeUI
text: id id module defaultFileTypes (character) default file types userFileTypes (character) user file types specified "Pandora Platform" settings dataSource (reactiveValues) path, filename, type input, output selectSourceServer()

title: Select Source UI — selectSourceUI
text: UI module Server function module

title: Select Source UI — selectSourceUI
code: selectSourceUI(   id,   defaultSource,   ckanFileTypes,   importType,   isInternet,   fileInputAccept = "zip" )  selectSourceServer(   id,   importType = "data",   openPopupReset,   internetCon,   githubRepo,   folderOnGithub,   pathToLocal,   ckanFileTypes = c("xls", "xlsx", "csv", "odt", "txt") )

title: Select Source UI — selectSourceUI
text: id id module defaultSource (character) default source input "Source", e.g. "ckan", "file", "url" ckanFileTypes (character) file types allowed import Pandora ("ckan"). E.g. `importType = "data"`: c("xls", "xlsx", "csv", "odt", "txt"); `importType = "zip"`: c("zip");  `importType = "list"`: c("json") importType (character) type import, either "model", "zip" "list". ImportType == "model" expects zip file containing model. file unzipped, model object extracted, checked valid app. ImportType == "zip" enables optional parameter 'expectedFileInZip'. file validated path zip file returned. ImportType == "list" expects json file containing list. file read checked. isInternet (logical) set TRUE, internet connection. parameter ignored type = "file" type = "remoteModel" fileInputAccept (character) (optional) accept attribute fileInput. E.g. ".zip" output getFileInputAccept(importType, fileExtension) openPopupReset (reactive) TRUE popup (re-)opened internetCon (reactive) TRUE internet connection githubRepo (character) name used github repository, e.g. "bpred" folderOnGithub (character) folder github remote files stored. correspond 'pathToLocal' since online offline files --date pathToLocal (character) relative path folder storing local files

what: Try Catch with Warnings and Errors — tryCatchWithWarningsAndErrors
title: Try Catch with Warnings and Errors — tryCatchWithWarningsAndErrors
text: Catches errors warnings forwards alert. error occurs, NULL returned. warning occurs, result returned.

title: Try Catch with Warnings and Errors — tryCatchWithWarningsAndErrors
code: tryCatchWithWarningsAndErrors(   expr,   errorTitle = "Modeling failed",   warningTitle = "",   alertStyle = "shinyjs",   silent = FALSE )

title: Try Catch with Warnings and Errors — tryCatchWithWarningsAndErrors
text: expr expression evaluated. errorTitle (character) error message title. warningTitle (character) warning message title. alertStyle (character) Either "shinyjs", "shinyalert". Specifies error warning given . "shinyjs" shinyjs::alert used; "shinyalert" shinyalert::shinyalert used. silent (logical) TRUE prevents alert, instead warning displayed. Use applied within Shiny session.

what: Update List Names if Duplicate — updateListNamesIfDuplicate
title: Update List Names if Duplicate — updateListNamesIfDuplicate
text: Updates names list (newList), names already exist another list (oldList). useful two lists concatenated duplicated names must prevented.

title: Update List Names if Duplicate — updateListNamesIfDuplicate
Update List Names if Duplicate — updateListNamesIfDuplicate
text: newList (list) names list updated oldList (list) names list kept listType (character) type list, used notification names changed. isShiny (logical) FALSE used shiny app, e.g. tests.

what: Update Names Entries if Duplicate — updateNameEntryIfDuplicate

title: Update User Inputs — updateUserInputs
text: Update values 'input' values userInputs. Entries NULL removed. updates entries present 'input'. Copy shinyTools::updateUserInputs() avoid dependency another helper package. Export 'DataTools' removed future versions.

text: id module id input input object server function output output object server function session session server function userInputs (list) list inputs updated inDataTools (logical) internal

title: Server function upload model — uploadModelServer
text: Backend upload model module

title: Server function upload model — uploadModelServer
code: uploadModelServer(   id,   githubRepo,   mainFolder = "predefinedModels",   subFolder = NULL,   rPackageName = "",   reloadChoices = reactive(TRUE),   onlySettings = FALSE,   fileExtension = "zip",   reset = reactive(FALSE) )

title: Server function upload model — uploadModelServer
text: id namespace id githubRepo (character) name used github repository, e.g. "bpred" mainFolder (character) folder containing loadable .zip files. apps folder "predefinedModels". apps can found "inst/app/". subFolder (character) (optional) subfolder containing loadable .zip files rPackageName (character) name package (Description file) module called. value needed determine Github repository package loading example models zip data links. reloadChoices (reactive) trigger access  github reload choices remote files onlySettings (logical) TRUE allow upload user inputs user data fileExtension (character) (optional) app specific file extension, e.g. "resources", "bpred", "bmsc" reset (reactive) resets selection online files

text: UI function upload zip file exportNotes list models

title: Upload model module — uploadModelUI
text: id id module label title module labelRemote label input remote files labelLocal label input local files fileExtension (character) (optional) app specific file extension, e.g. "resources", "bpred", "bmsc". files extension selectable. width width inputs percent
